WorkItem.Description:
$ mono Rawr.exe
 
"The current BuffCache.xml file was made with a previous version of Rawr, which is incompatible with the current versoin. It will be replaced with buff data included in the current versoin."
 
Deleting BuffCache.xml results in the same issue.

Comments.Message: This is a known issue with Mono that started showing up in b12. Revert to b11 for use with Mono for now. We're working with the Mono team to get this working again.
